original_text: But you have not done what you promised to do in the Lord's name. You should have obeyed my command.’
korean_text: 네가 어찌하여 여호와를 두고 한 맹세와 내가 네게 이른 명령을 지키지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: But you have not done what you promised to do
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 약속한 것을 실행하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: You should have obeyed my command
